name: Tomb of Bomb
description:
The marvelous adventurer Zoey was looking for treasure, but she appears to have been locked up in the hazardous Tomb of Bomb. Will you be able to rescue her?

How to play:

The aim of the game is to push the bomb near a bombable wall. This creates a passage that you can use to move to the next room. Every room has a set time limit before the bomb explodes. Don't stay in the explosion though! Most human bodies aren't resistant to that!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys: Move your character around and navigate menus.
R: Reset the current room.
Space: Speed up bomb.
Enter or Space: Confirm menu option.
Escape: Open pause menu and close pause menu.
F11: Enter fullscreen mode (may be glitchy!)
